resources.string: Only games that support this entire range of players will be shown. Exact means that only games that support that many players exactly will be shown (e.g. 2 player only games).
If you include games with missing values, the filter will show games with an unknown play time.
If you include games with missing values, the filter will show games without a suggested minimum age.
If you include games with missing values, the filter will show games without a reported average weight.
Do you want to clear the existing colors before assigning new ones?
You shouldn\'t be seeing this message. But if you are, please send a screenshot of this to bgg4android@gmail.com. Thanks!
"Are you sure you want to discard this %s?"
"Are you sure you want to discard changes to this %s?"
Are you sure you want to delete this play?

Export will save data from the app to the selected file locations, overwriting the existing file if necessary. Import will restore data from these same files, potentially overwriting existing data.
The imported file is the wrong type. Expected \'%1$s\', but got \'%2$s\'.
Sorting and filtering applied to your collection and saved as views.
The list of colors associated with each game.
Users\' favorite colors, which includes both GeekBuddies and players you\'ve played against.
Select a game to place it on the home screen.

Must supply a name to update plays
Your GeekBuddy\'s nickname has been updated to \"%s\".
There\'s already a collection view with this name. Do you want to update the existing view, or create a new one?
It appears as if you have no GeekBuddies.
It appears as if you have played against no one.
It appears as if you have played nowhere.
Unknown error trying to load your Geek Buddies.
You are not currently syncing your GeekBuddies. Would you like to enable that feature now?
No synced games in your collection. Maybe you should go to Settings > Sync and select some different statuses under Collection.
We\'re performing an initial sync. Go play a game. When you come back, you\'ll probably see some of your collection here.
If you want to see your Collection, go to Settings > Sync and select some statuses under Collection.
You have no games in your collection that match this filter. Maybe you should try different filters.
Collection sync for some of the filtered statuses is off. Try to enable it from Settings > Sync to display some games.
No previous locations. Add a new one.
No previous players. Add a new one.
This game isn\'t in your collection.
No games in this GeekBuddy\'s collection.
No teams/colors set for this game.
If you want to see your Plays, go to Settings > Sync and check the box next to Plays.
You haven\'t logged any plays with this GeekBuddy.
You haven\'t logged any plays with this player.
You haven\'t logged any plays at this location.
You haven\'t logged any plays of this game.
You have no plays you\'re working on.
No plays are waiting to be sent to the \'Geek.
You have no plays that can be analyzed.
No one has anything to say.
Nothing to see here. Move along.
This GeekBuddy hasn\'t set their list of favorites colors. Get started by generating a list of colors in random order.
Whoa! It looks like BoardGameGeek.com is having some issues. If the website is up and you still see this message, please let us know about the error below. Otherwise, please check back later.\n\n%s
No stats have been calculated yet.
No results.\n\nThe search function doesn\'t like some common words. Try again, dropping \"the\", \"a\", and \"of\", etc.
Trying to view an unspecified game.
Use the search field above to search against BoardGameGeek\'s entire database. Autocomplete will show only games in your collection.
Not logged in. Try again later.
Unsuccessful trying to delete a play
Added user name \"%1$s\" to player name \"%2$s\"
You are not currently syncing your plays. Would you like to enable that feature now?
Warning! Making any changes here will remove the inventory date.
I found this game using BGG4A that I thought you might like:
I found these games using BGG4A that I thought you might like:
I found the thread \"%1$s\" in the \"%2$s\" forum using BGG4A.
I found the thread \"%1$s\" in the \"%2$s\" forum for \"%3$s\" using BGG4A.
I found this article in the thread \"%1$s\" in the \"%2$s\" forum using BGG4A.
I found this article in the thread \"%1$s\" in the \"%2$s\" forum for \"%3$s\" using BGG4A.
I found the GeekList \"%1$s\" using BGG4A.
Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
This will be used as the player\'s name when logging plays.
Change existing plays to the new name.
This game isn\'t in your collection.
Do you want keep the current starting positions or clear them?
You\'ve played at least %1$,d games %1$,d times or more. You need at least %2$,d more play(s) to increase this number.\n\nhttps://boardgamegeek.com/thread/953084
This game contributes to your H-index.
You\'ve played against at least %1$,d players %1$,d times or more. You need at least %2$,d more play(s) to increase this number.\n\nhttps://boardgamegeek.com/thread/1448479
A measure of how well played your owned collection is. A negative number indicates the difference of unplayed games vs. dimes you own.\n\nhttps://extstats.drfriendless.com/
Similar to the friendless metric, it is an average number of plays with no cheating.\n\nhttps://extstats.drfriendless.com/

Measures the success ratio using:

 100 * PlayTimesPlayer / winnable games

PlayTimesPlayer = ∑ (# plays * # players)

The Friendless Happiness Metric (FHM) is a measure of the happiness this game has provided, as defined by Friendless.

See his awesome site for Extended Stats: https://extstats.drfriendless.com/

rating * 5 + plays + months played * 4 + hours played
The Huber Happiness Metric (HHM) is a measure of the happiness this game has provided, as defined by Joe Huber (huber).\n\n(rating - 5) * hours played
The Huber Heat Metric attempts to assess how much you love this game right now. Well, at least for the last year.

The Randy Cox not-Unhappiness Metric (R!UHM) is a measure of the happiness this game has provided, as defined by Randy Cox.

ln(flash / lag * months played * rating)
flash = time between first and last plays
lag = time between last play and today
Utilization (as proposed by Friendless) assumes that if you play a game 10 more times, you gain 90% of the remaining utility.
These stats work much better if you sync both your owned and played games.
You can undo this action by navigating to the app\'s Sync Settings and modifying the collection statuses.

Removing games no longer in your collection
Games you rate higher than the average.
I got a copy of this - jealous much?!
Games you own but haven\'t played yet
Games you\'ve just acquired but haven\'t played yet
Plays have been synced between %1$s and %2$s.
There\'s a problem with BoardGameGeek. Be patient while they fix it. (HTTP code: %s)
BoardGameGeek is still processing this request.
Timed out trying to communicate with BoardGameGeek
Account couldn\'t be added. Please check the Accounts section of your device\'s settings to ensure there is no BoardGameGeek account listed already.
Multiple accounts of type %s are not allowed.
The existing account for %1$s doesn\'t match the one requested for %2$s.
Uh-oh! This isn\'t an error we expect to see. If you have ScorePal installed, there\'s a known problem that one prevents the other from signing in. We\'re working to resolve the issue.
These stats work much better if you sync your rated and played games.
A calculation designed to determine your favorite %s.\n\nhttps://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/BGG_for_Android_Users_Manual#toc23
